anya-e0802n6:16_0: Atha sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni parassapadasaññāni honti.
anya-e0802n6:17_0: Taṁ yathā? Ti anti, si tha, mi ma.
anya-e0802n6:20_0: Sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni.
anya-e0802n6:21_0: Taṁ yathā? Te ante, se vhe, e mhe.
anya-e0802n6:24_0: Tāsaṁ sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ parassapadānaṁ, attanopadānañca dve dve padāni paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni honti.
anya-e0802n6:25_1: Ti anti iti paṭhamapurisā, si tha iti majjhimapurisā, mi ma iti uttamapurisā.
anya-e0802n6:25_2: Attanopadānampi te ante iti paṭhamapurisā, se vhe iti majjhimapurisā, e mhe iti uttamapurisā. Evaṁ sabbattha.
anya-e0802n6:26_1: Nāmamhi payujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamo, tumhe majjhimo, amhe uttamo.
anya-e0802n6:28_0: Sabbesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ paṭhamamajjhimuttama purisānaṁ ekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0802n6:29_0: So ca paṭhati, tvañca paṭhasi, tumhe paṭhatha. So ca pacati, tvañca pacasi. Tumhe pacatha.
anya-e0802n6:29_1: Evaṁ sesāsu vibhattīsu paro puriso yojetabbo.
anya-e0802n6:31_0: Nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:36_0: Tumhe payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe majjhimapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:41_0: Amhe payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe uttamapuriso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:51_0: Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe ca anuttakāle pañcamī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:54_0: Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:60_0: Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā hiyyattanī vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:61_0: So agamā maggaṁ, te agamū maggaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:63_0: Ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā samīpe ajjatanīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:64_0: So maggaṁ agamī, te maggaṁ agamuṁ.
anya-e0802n6:66_0: Hiyyattanīajjatanīiccetā vibhattiyo yadā māyogā, tadā sabbakāle ca honti.
anya-e0802n6:67_0: Mā gamā, mā vacā, mā gamī, mā vacī.
anya-e0802n6:71_0: So gacchissati, karissati. Te gacchissanti, karissanti.
anya-e0802n6:73_0: Kriyātipannamatte atīte kāle kālātipatti vibhatti hoti.
anya-e0802n6:74_0: So ce taṁ yānaṁ alabhissā, agacchissā.
anya-e0802n6:74_1: Te ce taṁ yānaṁ alabhissaṁsu, agacchissaṁsu.
anya-e0802n6:75_0: 423, 426.Vattamānā ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe.
anya-e0802n6:76_0: Vattamānā iccesā saññā hoti ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetesaṁ dvādasannaṁ padānaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:78_0: 424, 450.Pañcamī tu antu, hitha, mima, taṁ antaṁ, ssu vho, e āmase.
anya-e0802n6:79_0: Pañcamīiccesā saññā hoti tu antu, hi tha, mima, taṁ antaṁ, ssu vho, e āmase iccetesaṁ dvādasannaṁ padānaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:81_0: 425, 453.Sattamī eyya eyyuṁ, eyyā si eyyā tha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṁ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0802n6:82_0: Sattamī iccesā saññā hoti eyya eyyuṁ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṁ, etho, eyyāvho, eyyaṁ eyyāmhe iccetesaṁ dvādasannaṁ padānaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:84_0: 426, 459.Parokkhā au ettha, aṁmha, tthare, ttho vho, iṁ mhe.
anya-e0802n6:85_0: Parokkhā iccesā saññā hoti a u, ettha, aṁ mha, ttha re ttho vho, iṁ mhe iccetesaṁ dvādasannaṁ padānaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:87_0: 427, 455.Hiyyattanīāū, ottha, aṁmhā, tthatthuṁ, se vhaṁ, iṁ mhase.
anya-e0802n6:88_0: Hiyyattanī iccesā saññā hoti ā ū, o ttha, aṁ mhā, ttha tthuṁ, se vhaṁ, iṁ mhase iccetesaṁ dvādasannaṁ padānaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:90_0: 428, 468.Ajjatanī ī uṁ, o ttha, iṁ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṁ, aṁ mhe.
anya-e0802n6:91_0: Ajjatanī iccesā saññā hoti ī uṁ, o ttha, iṁmhā, ā ū, sevhaṁ, aṁ mhe iccetesaṁ dvādasannaṁ padānaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:93_0: 429, 472.Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṁ ssāmhe.
anya-e0802n6:94_0: Bhavissantī iccesā saññā hoti ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṁ ssāmhe iccetesaṁ dvādasannaṁ padānaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:96_0: 430, 373.Kālātipattissā ssaṁsu, sse ssatha, ssaṁ ssāmhā, ssatha sissu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṁ ssāmhase.
anya-e0802n6:97_0: Kālātipatti iccesā saññā hoti ssā ssaṁsu, sse ssatha, ssaṁ ssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṁ ssāmhase iccetesaṁ dvādasannaṁ padānaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:100_0: Hiyyattanādayo catasso vibhattiyo sabbadhātuka saññā honti.
anya-e0802n6:107_1: Yo koci karoti, taṁ añño ‘‘karohi karohi’’ iccevaṁ bravīti, atha vā karontaṁ payojayati = kāreti.
anya-e0802n6:107_3: Taḷākaṁ samuddamiva attānamācarati = samuddāyati, saddo cicciṭamiva attānamācarati = cicciṭāyati, vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṁ vāsiṭṭho. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:108_0: 433, 528.Tija gupa kita māne hi kha cha sā vā.
anya-e0802n6:109_0: Tija gupa kita mānu iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:113_0: Bhujaghasa hara su pāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu kha cha saiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:119_0: Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati = pabbatāyati, taḷākaṁ samuddamiva attānamācarati = samuddāyati, saddo cicciṭamiva attānamācarati = cicciṭāyati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:121_0: Nāmato upamānā ācāratthe ca īyapaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:122_0: Achattaṁ chattamiva ācarati =chattīyati, aputtaṁ puttamiva ācarati=puttīyati.
anya-e0802n6:124_0: Ācāreti kimatthaṁ? Achattaṁ chattamiva rakkhati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:127_1: Evaṁ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, dhanīyati, ghaṭīyati.
anya-e0802n6:128_0: Atticchattheti kimatthaṁ? Aññassa pattamicchati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:129_0: 438, 540.Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0802n6:130_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi ṇeṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayaiccete paccayā honti kāritasaññā ca hetvatthe.
anya-e0802n6:131_0: Yo koci karoti, taṁ añño ‘‘karohi karohi’’ iccevaṁ bravīti, atha vā karontaṁ payojayati = kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārā payati.
anya-e0802n6:131_1: Ye keci karonti, te aññe ‘‘karotha karotha’’ iccevaṁ bruvanti = kārenti, kārayanti, kārāpenti, kārāpayanti.
anya-e0802n6:131_2: Yo koci pacati, taṁ añño ‘‘pacāhi pacāhi’’iccevaṁ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṁ payojayati = pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati.
anya-e0802n6:131_3: Ye keci pacanti, te aññe ‘‘pacatha pacatha’’ iccevaṁ bruvanti = pācenti, pācayanti, pācāpenti. Pācāpayanti.
anya-e0802n6:131_5: Bhaṇenti, bhaṇayanti, bhaṇāpenti, bhaṇāpayanti. Tathariva aññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n6:135_0: Tasmā nāmasmā ṇayapaccayo hoti kāritasañño ca dhāturūpe sati.
anya-e0802n6:136_0: Hatthinā atikkamati maggaṁ = atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati gītaṁ = upavīṇayati, daḷhaṁ karoti vīriyaṁ = daḷhayati, visuddhā hoti ratti = visuddhayati.
anya-e0802n6:137_1: Santaṁ karoti = santārati, upakkamaṁ karoti = upakkamālati.
anya-e0802n6:140_0: Ṭhīyate, bujjhate, paccate, labbhate, karīyate, yujjate, uccate.
anya-e0802n6:143_0: Tassa yapaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṁ hoti dhātūnaṁ antena saha yathāsambhavaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:144_0: Vuccate, vuccante, uccate, uccante, paccate, paccante.
anya-e0802n6:144_2: Bujjhate, bujjhante, kujjhate, kujjhante, ujjhate, ujjhante. Haññate, haññante. Kayyate, kayyante. Dibbate, dibbante.
anya-e0802n6:146_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi yamhi paccaye, pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:151_0: Vuḍḍhate, phallate, dammate, sakkate, labbhate, dissate.
anya-e0802n6:153_0: Yathā heṭṭhā bhāvakammesu yapaccayassa ādeso hoti tathā kattaripi yapaccayassa ādeso kātabbo.
anya-e0802n6:159_0: Rudhaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato apaccayo hoti kattari, pubbe niggahitāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:161_0: Caggahaṇena i ī e oiccete paccayā honti niggahitapubbañca.
anya-e0802n6:162_0: Rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, rundhoti, sumbhoti, parisumbhoti.
anya-e0802n6:167_0: Suiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇu ṇā u ṇāiccete paccayā honti kattari.
anya-e0802n6:168_0: Abhisuṇoti , abhisuṇāti, saṁvuṇoti, saṁvuṇāti, āvuṇoti, āvuṇāti, pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0802n6:171_0: Kiṇāti, jināti, dhunāti, munāti, lunāti, punāti.
anya-e0802n6:173_0: Gahaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ppaṇhāiccete paccayā honti kattari.
anya-e0802n6:176_0: Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato o yiraiccete paccayā honti kattari.
anya-e0802n6:177_0: Tanoti , tanohi, karoti, karohi, kayi rati, kayirāhi.
anya-e0802n6:179_0: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari, kāritasaññā ca.
anya-e0802n6:180_0: Coreti, corayati, cinteti, cintayati, manteti, mantayati.
anya-e0802n6:182_0: Bhāve ca kammani ca attanopadāni honti.
anya-e0802n6:183_0: Uccate, uccante, majjate, majjante, yujjate, yujjante, kujjhate, kujjhante, labbhate, labbhante, kayyate, kayyante.
anya-e0802n6:189_0: Titikkhati , jigucchati, vīmaṁsati, samuddāyati, puttīyati, kāreti, pāceti.
anya-e0802n6:194_0: Bhūiccevamādayo ye saddagaṇā, te dhātusaññā honti.
anya-e0802n6:195_0: Bhavati, bhavanti, carati, caranti, pacati, pacanti, cintayati, cintayanti, hoti, honti, gacchati, gacchanti.
anya-e0802n6:199_0: Ādibhūtānaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ ekassarānaṁ kvaci dvebhāvo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:200_0: Titikkhati , jigucchati, tikicchati, vīmaṁsati, bubhukkhati, pivāsati, daddallati, dadāti, jahāti, caṅkamati.
anya-e0802n6:203_0: Dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo, so abbhāsasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n6:206_0: Abbhāse vattamānassa sarassa rasso hoti. Dadhāti, jahāti.
anya-e0802n6:211_0: Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa ca vaggo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:212_0: Cikicchati , jigucchati, jighacchati, jigīsati, jaṅgamati, caṅkamati.
anya-e0802n6:214_0: Mānakitaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ abbhāsagatānaṁ vakāra takārattaṁ hoti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:221_0: Abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti, akāro vā.
anya-e0802n6:222_0: Jigucchati, pivāsati, vīmaṁsati, jighacchati, babhūva, dadhāti.
anya-e0802n6:229_0: Tato abbhāsato pāmānaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ vāmaṁiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ sapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:240_0: Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṁ nāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:243_0: Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:247_0: Byañjanantassa dhātussa co hoti chapaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0802n6:250_0: Byañjanantassa dhātussa ko hoti khapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:253_0: Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva gīādeso hoti sapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:256_0: Brūbhūiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ āhabhūvaiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ parokkhāyaṁ vibhattiyaṁ.
anya-e0802n6:260_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa anto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu paccayavibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n6:261_0: Gacchamāno, gacchanto. Gacchati, gameti. Gacchatu, gametu. Gaccheyya. Gameyya. Agacchā, agamā. Agacchī, agamī. Gacchissati, gamissati. Agacchissā, agamissā.
anya-e0802n6:264_0: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n6:270_0: Mikāraggahaṇena hivibhattimhi akāro kvaci na dīghamāpajjate. Gacchahi.
anya-e0802n6:273_0: Gaccha, gacchāhi, gama, gamāhi, gamaya, gamayāhi.
anya-e0802n6:276_0: Hūiccetassa dhātussa saro e ha oha ettamāpajja te bhavissantimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:277_0: Hehiti, hehinti, hohiti, hohinti, heti, henti, hehissati, hehissanti, hohissati, hohissanti, hessati, hessanti.
anya-e0802n6:281_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sapaccayassa kāhādeso hoti vā bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi, sassa ca niccaṁ lopo hoti.
anya-e0802n6:282_0: Kāhati, kāhiti, kāhasi, kāhisi, kāhāmi, kāhāma.
anya-e0802n6:284_0: Sapaccayaggahaṇena aññehipi bhavissantiyā vibhattiyā khāmi khāma chāmi chāmaiccādayo ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n6:288_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa antassa aṁ hoti mimaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n6:292_0: Kāreti, kārenti, kārayati, kārayanti, kārāpeti, kārāpenti, kārāpayati, kārāpayanti.
anya-e0802n6:295_0: Ghaṭādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ asaṁyogantānaṁ vuddhi hoti vā kārite.
anya-e0802n6:296_0: Ghāṭeti, ghaṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭayati, ghāṭāpeti, ghaṭāpeti, ghāṭāpayati, ghaṭāpayati, gāmeti, gameti, gāmayati, gamayati, gāmāpeti, gamāpeti. Gāmāpayati, gamāpayati.
anya-e0802n6:299_0: Aññesu ca paccayesu sabbesaṁ dhātūnaṁ asaṁyogantānaṁ vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0802n6:303_0: Guha dusaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite.
anya-e0802n6:306_0: Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ vakārassa ukāro hoti yapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:309_0: Hakārassa vipariyayo hoti yapaccaye pare, yapaccayassa ca lo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:312_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghekāro hoti ppapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:315_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:318_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa kāsattaṁ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n6:320_0: Kāsattamitibhāvaniddesena aññatthāpi sāgamo hoti. Ahosi, adāsi.
anya-e0802n6:322_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā mimaiccetesaṁ vibhattīnaṁ mhimhādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:325_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā thassa vibhattissa tthattaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:328_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā tissa vibhattissa tthittaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:331_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:334_0: Asasseva dhātussa simhi vibhattimhi antassa lopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n6:337_0: Labhaiccetāya dhātuyā ī iṁnaṁ vibhattīnaṁ ttha tthaṁādesā honti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:340_0: Kusaiccetāya dhātuyā īvibhattissa cchihoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
anya-e0802n6:343_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:346_0: Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:349_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:352_0: 502, 493.Yamhi dā dhā mā ṭhā hā pā mahamathādīnamī.
anya-e0802n6:353_0: Yamhi paccaye pare dā dhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha matha iccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ anto īkāramāpajjate.
anya-e0802n6:354_0: Dīyati, dhīyati, mīyati, ṭhīyati, hīyati, pīyati, mahīyati, mathīyati.
anya-e0802n6:356_0: Yajaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa ikārādeso hoti yapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n6:362_0: Jara mara iccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ jīra jiyya miyyādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:363_0: Jīrati, jīranti, jiyyati, jiyyanti, miyyati, miyyanti, marati, maranti.
anya-e0802n6:365_0: Sabbattha vibhattipaccayesu asaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n6:373_0: Eyyassa vibhattissa ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa iyā ñāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n6:377_0: Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā, yakārattañca.
anya-e0802n6:392_0: Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:396_0: Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n6:399_0: Te o eiccete āva āyādese pāpuṇanti kārite.
anya-e0802n6:401_0: Yogavibhāgena aññasmimpi ekārassa āyādeso hoti. Gāyati, gāyanti.
anya-e0802n6:407_0: Idha ākhyāte aniddiṭṭhesu sādhanesu kvaci dhātuvibhattipaccayānaṁ dīghaviparītādesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpāni kātabbāni.
anya-e0802n6:408_0: Jāyati , kareyya, jāniyā, siyā, kare, gacche, jaññā, vakkhetha, dakkhetha, dicchati, agacchi, agacchuṁ, ahosi, ahesuṁ iccevamādīni aññānipi sādhanāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0802n6:414_0: Kvaci akārāgamo hoti hiyyattanī ajjatanīkālātipattiiccetāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n6:418_0: Brūiccetāya dhātuyā īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n6:421_0: Dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti anekasarassa.
anya-e0802n6:426_0: Isu yamu iccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ anto ccho hoti vā. Icchati, niyacchati.
